title: MC_ReadBoolParameter_SML (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL MC_ReadBoolParameter_SML
Reads the value of a boolean SoftMotion or axis specific parameter.
For the list of all SoftMotion parameter numbers see
Axis_REF_SML
.
See
MC_ReadParameter_SML (FB)
for a description of axis specific parameters.
Note
If the parameter is not of type
BOOL
, the returned value is undefined.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment: Get value is updated continuously while enabled

rows:
The FB is not finished and new output values are to be
expected
